attributes.action: Stop Using Tax-Payers Money to Pay the Salaries of Full-Time Union Officials
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The public should not have to pay the salaries of full time trade union officials, such as the national chairman of the Prison Officers Association and others in that organisation.
Trade Unions are vital in a democracy, they have been responsible for the majority of workplace safeguards entrenched in law today - but Unions are creatures of solidarity not statute and as such their full time officials should be wholly funded by those who elect them and who benefit from their efforts.
